thread.title: Charlize Theron adopts child: Baby girl called August | The
thread.title_full: Charlize Theron adopts child: Baby girl called August | The Advertiser

author: STAFF WRITERS
title: Charlize Theron adopts child: Baby girl called August | The
text:
CHARLIZE Theron has adopted another baby.
According to TMZ , the 39-year-old took custody of a newborn girl called August last month.
It’s Theron’s second child after adopting her three-year-old son Jackson back in 2012.
It has been a big few months for the Mad Max: Fury Road star who called it quits with her fiancee, Sean Penn, in June.
The Hollywood couple started dating in December 2013 and secretly got engaged in December 2014.
US Weekly reported it was Theron who broke things off, feeling the romance had run its course after returning from the Cannes Film Festival in May.
Just three months ago, Theron was gushing about the 54-year-old fellow Oscar winner in an interview with Esquire , saying, “I’m a very, very, very lucky girl”.
Similarly, in an interview with Esquire UK in March, Penn said he was ready to be a husband after his previous failed marriages.
Oh well.
What a shame it didn’t work out. Source: Getty Images
Charlize’s son Jackson is a little cutie. Source: Splash News Australia
Originally published as Charlize Theron adopts second child
